video_title: Inside China's AI Revolution - SuperAI Singapore 2025
description:
Learn more about SuperAI: superai.com
Follow us on X: x.com/superai_conf

Panel: Inside China's AI Revolution

Speakers:
Yefei Song, Head of Solutions, International Business @ Ant Digital Technologies
Ken Qian, Head of AI @ MMS AI Insuretech

Moderator:
James Ong, Founder and MD @ AIII

Stage: io.net Main Stage
#superai #china #ai #agi #llms

Recorded on 18 June 2025
